page.title: 13Religion
page.content: RELIGION Many people living in our area are Christians.Three children in our school are Muslim.They worship in a mosque in Liverpool 8.There are many Christian denominations.The largest group of church attenders are Roman Catholic.They worship at St.Edmund's R.C. Church in Oxford Road.Their priest is Reverend Patrick Sykes. Both St.Edmund's and St.John's have Primary Schools.Each year the pupils from both schools worship together in one of their churches.Some of the children in our school go to Waterloo Baptist Church and others to Kingsway Christian Centre.Most churches have youth organisations and meetings for Bible Study and prayer.St.Edmund's and St.John's Churches cook meals each week for elderly people.
